laneOccupancy.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the number of bikes circulating on the bike lane.

laneLength.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the length of the bike lane.

laneWidth.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates the width of the bike lane.

dateObserved.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat.
